post.body: so hows that new phone? always wondered what the JITTERBUG was like! HA! sure mr byers, well add that number to your list...
hey youre the soccer dad. i take my kid to rock shows and let them meet rock stars. that and i still look way younger than you
ill tell molly that next time you bring her over and the kids decide to watch all the episodes of Tenacious D on DVD.
better him like that one than "Cock Push ups"... KAI - EARMUFFS!
yeah, we have 3 cats and a couple of them don't dig the food sometimes. not fun to find that out by stepping in something warm...
yeah but does he really like the Who?
thats because spelling is a new gig for you.
noticed that myself...
actually, youre right...though i see more frat-bags than red-necks...just as bad...
so that's what the kids are calling it these days...?
sorry, redneck central is a bit south of NE.
thats a classic! the old tom and jerry guys did that. shame on you! grinch. he he
you dont even want to know what i thought that said...had to read it again.
go brad!!
ive been using it all day on snail cam. cant get enough. gotta put it in my podcast...
now leave me alone while im listening to my favorite little river band tunes...
wow! just had a big spike in our love, sex, and business podcast stats! yay! our guests must have told a friend or two.
watching my cat hack something up on the rug. WTF?
wanting my gmail inbox to bring me good messages today.
Making Christmas...making Christmas...and writing about baby carriers...sooo cold outside...
is there a possibility of a part time job in my future? a christmas miracle per se? santa are you listening? creativity is being wasted...
now listening to the psychedelic furs. aahh memories...
really wishing more people put up their promos on podcast pickle...
new podcasts!! http://freelanceamerica.libsyn.com and http://lovesexandbusiness.libsyn.com Check them out and let me know what you think!
vince guaraldi trio is the best...
drinking a martini, painting, and listening to old school christmas tunes on accuradio...nice.
back from tour, cleaned house, now editing podcasts...yay.
getting breakfast ready, then kids will be over, already a great xmas...
have to say The Movies rocked...
but i feel ya....
bored. time for some snail cam and music...send suggestions... http://tinyurl.com/4kdx3n
New episode of Worlds of Wayne http://worldsofwayne.com got Coles Whalen in the studio for homemade Kahlua! Good stuff.
risking a bit of metallica
song suggestions??
Snail camin with Kendall! http://tinyurl.com/4kdx3n
Monday morning snail cam! http://tinyurl.com/4kdx3n
pre podcast SNAIL CAM! http://tinyurl.com/4kdx3n
http://tinyurl.com/4kdx3n
snail cam now on myspace... http://myspace.com/amazingsnailcam SNAIL CAM LIVE NOW!! with Christmas music
Saturday morning, wife is feeling ill, cold and crappy outside. not sure whats going to happen today. 2 xmas parties 2nite? maybe...
